spells.name: Adjustable Disguise
spells.description: As disguise self, but you can change the disguise as a swift action.

spells.name: Air Geyser
spells.description: Blast of air deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage and knocks opponent upward.

spells.name: Anchored Step
spells.description: Vines beneath your feet stabilize you but slow you down.

spells.name: Aura Sight
spells.description: Alignment auras become visible to you.

spells.name: Barrow Haze
spells.description: Fog obscures the vision of others and extends the range of your hexes.

spells.name: Blood Sentinel
spells.description: Animate an animal sculpture to be your temporary familiar.

spells.name: Contingent Action
spells.description: Set the condition for triggering a target's readied standard, move, or swift action.

spells.name: Disable Construct
spells.description: Touch attack makes a construct helpless for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Heart of the Metal
spells.description: Enable weapons to overcome DR like adamantine, cold iron, or silver.

spells.name: Mindlocked Messenger
spells.description: Target gains a message that can be given only to its intended recipient.

spells.name: Nauseating Trail
spells.description: Creature leaves a trail of stinking cloud squares.

spells.name: Polymorph Familiar
spells.description: Give your familiar the shape of another animal.

spells.name: Shield Companion
spells.description: As shield other, but affecting your companion creature.

spells.name: Silver Darts
spells.description: Cone of silver darts deals 1d6 piercing damage/level, less against armored targets.

spells.name: Stunning Barrier, Greater
spells.description: Magical field grants a +2 bonus to AC and on saves, and stuns multiple creatures attacking you.

spells.name: Unliving Rage
spells.description: As rage, except affecting only undead.

spells.name: Wall of Nausea
spells.description: Creatures that pass through the wall are nauseated and might fall prone.
